fill_mask.template: {masked_sentence} Fill the mask with the missing word.

find_relation.template: Given the following paragraph : {masked_sentence | replace("[MASK]",obj_label)}. what is the relationship between {obj_label} and {sub_label} ?

replace_mask.template: Replace the mask with the correct word: {masked_sentence}

write_negation.template: write the negation of the following statements : {template | replace("[X]",sub_surface) | replace("[Y]", obj_surface)}

negate_sentence.template: Negate the following statement : {template | replace("[X]",sub_surface) | replace("[Y]", obj_surface)}
